scripts.dev: yarn build && yarn test && yarn contract:deploy && yarn contract:init && yarn contract:mint && yarn contract:view && yarn contract:proof
scripts.contract:deploy:
node env-tmp-env.js && source .env-tmp && printf "
" | concordium-client module deploy dist/mysomeid.wasm.v1  --no-confirm  --name $C_NAME --sender 4FSkV8ckXL9o3KxbY2kdD76a4Je3JWvV4EBmXkFNwjYddjc5zY --grpc-ip 146.190.94.164 --grpc-port 10001 2>&1 | tee deploy.log && node env-create.js
scripts.contract:init:
source .env && printf "
" | concordium-client contract init $C_NAME --no-confirm --contract mysomeid --parameter-json artifacts/init.json  --schema dist/mysomeid.schema.bin --sender 4FSkV8ckXL9o3KxbY2kdD76a4Je3JWvV4EBmXkFNwjYddjc5zY --energy 30000 --grpc-ip 146.190.94.164 --grpc-port 10001 2>&1 | tee init.log && node env-store_index.js
scripts.contract:name:
source .env && printf "
" | concordium-client contract name $C_IDX --no-confirm --name "MySoMeID"
scripts.contract:listOwnedTokens:
source .env && printf "
" | concordium-client contract invoke $C_IDX --entrypoint listOwnedTokens --parameter-json artifacts/list_owned_tokens.json --schema dist/mysomeid.schema.bin --grpc-ip 146.190.94.164  --grpc-port 10001
scripts.contract:view:
source .env && printf "
" | concordium-client contract invoke $C_IDX --entrypoint view --schema dist/mysomeid.schema.bin --grpc-ip 146.190.94.164 --grpc-port 10001
scripts.contract:mint:
source .env && printf "
" | concordium-client contract update $C_IDX --no-confirm --entrypoint mint --parameter-json artifacts/mint.json --schema ./dist/mysomeid.schema.bin --sender 4FSkV8ckXL9o3KxbY2kdD76a4Je3JWvV4EBmXkFNwjYddjc5zY --energy 6000 --grpc-ip 146.190.94.164  --grpc-port 10001 2>&1 | tee mint.log
scripts.contract:meta:
source .env && printf "
" | concordium-client contract invoke $C_IDX  --entrypoint tokenMetadata --parameter-json artifacts/meta.json --schema ./dist/mysomeid.schema.bin --grpc-ip 146.190.94.164  --grpc-port 10001 2>&1 | tee view.log
scripts.contract:proof:
source .env && printf "
" | concordium-client contract invoke $C_IDX  --entrypoint proof --parameter-json artifacts/proof.json --schema ./dist/mysomeid.schema.bin --grpc-ip 146.190.94.164  --grpc-port 10001 2>&1 | tee mint.log
scripts.contract:revoke:
source .env && printf "
" | concordium-client contract update $C_IDX  --no-confirm --entrypoint burn --parameter-json artifacts/revoke.json --schema ./dist/mysomeid.schema.bin --sender 4FSkV8ckXL9o3KxbY2kdD76a4Je3JWvV4EBmXkFNwjYddjc5zY --energy 6000 --grpc-ip 146.190.94.164 --grpc-port 10001  2>&1 | tee revoke.log
